meanings.definition: The act of not depositing something.
meanings.sent1: The nondepositions of the money in the bank led to confusion.
meanings.sent2: She avoided any nondepositions of her jewelry in the safe.
meanings.sent3: The nondepositions of the cookies in the jar made them easy to reach.
meanings.sent4: His nondepositions of trust in others left him feeling isolated.
meanings.sent5: The nondepositions of knowledge in his mind made learning difficult.

meanings.definition: Statements that are not made under oath.
meanings.sent1: The lawyer reviewed the nondepositions before the trial.
meanings.sent2: The witness decided to provide nondepositions to the court.
meanings.sent3: The nondepositions in the case added a layer of mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her nondepositions were taken seriously by the authorities.
meanings.sent5: The nondepositions raised doubts about the truthfulness of the testimony.

meanings.definition: The lack of placing something in a specific location.
meanings.sent1: The nondepositions of the keys caused a delay in leaving.
meanings.sent2: She realized the nondepositions of her bag on the table.
meanings.sent3: His nondepositions of the bookshelf made it look empty.
meanings.sent4: The nondepositions of the vase on the shelf created a bare look.
meanings.sent5: The nondepositions of the package on the doorstep puzzled the recipient.
